articles.author: Yushi Nohara
articles.title: Huawei P Smart 2019 enables EMUI 12 in more markets - HC Newsroom
articles.description: A week ago, Huawei started dispatching the EMUI 12 for the Huawei P Smart 2019 users in the European market, and now the company is working to expand its reach in the more market. Well, the EMUI 12 itself is a vast update and it’s normal to have the hefty cha…
articles.content: EMUI 12 carnival continues to expand and Huawei is sending this update for as many devices as possible. However, no one is happier than the smartphone owners of – Huawei P Smart 2019, P Smart+, Smart… [+4842 chars]

articles.title: Moscow, Kyiv exchange accusations after Ukrainian nuclear plant shelled - Reuters
articles.description: Russia and Ukraine on Friday accused each other of shelling the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant, the biggest of its kind in Europe, and laying the ground for a potential disaster.
articles.content: LONDON, Aug 5 (Reuters) - Russia and Ukraine on Friday accused each other of shelling the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant, the biggest of its kind in Europe, and laying the ground for a potential di… [+2404 chars]

articles.title: How Malaysia ended up owing RM57b to a sultan's heirs - Malaysiakini
articles.description: In 1878, two Europeans signed a deal with a sultan.
articles.content: Malaysia is scrambling to protect its assets as the descendants of the last sultan of the remote Philippine region of Sulu look to enforce a U$15 billion (RM67 billion) arbitration award in a dispute… [+5866 chars]
